events.name: Singapore Science Festival: Maker Faire Singapore
events.description: See more than 600 do-it-yourself inventors, creators and enthusiasts showcase fun and creative projects in science, art, craft, engineering and technology. Highlights include a cotton candy shooter and DIY drones. There will also be 75 workshops and talks on everything from making music on a slime synthesiser to bike restoration and making mini robots.
events.location: Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD), 8 Somapah Road, Singapore 487372
